analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/13/0xc105c8c7f44128594e49b8300d16b718567863ec.sol:
	Contract MilestonePricing has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/13/0xc105c8c7f44128594e49b8300d16b718567863ec.sol#1120-1123)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Reentrancy in CrowdsaleExt.finalize (/unique_chucks/13/0xc105c8c7f44128594e49b8300d16b718567863ec.sol#1508-1519):
	External calls:
	- finalizeAgent.finalizeCrowdsale() (/unique_chucks/13/0xc105c8c7f44128594e49b8300d16b718567863ec.sol#1518)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- finalized (/unique_chucks/13/0xc105c8c7f44128594e49b8300d16b718567863ec.sol#1518)

Reentrancy in CrowdsaleExt.investInternal (/unique_chucks/13/0xc105c8c7f44128594e49b8300d16b718567863ec.sol#1310-1405):
	External calls:
	- getState() == State.Funding (/unique_chucks/13/0xc105c8c7f44128594e49b8300d16b718567863ec.sol#1318-1332)
	- tokenAmount = pricingStrategy.calculatePrice(weiAmount,weiRaised - presaleWeiRaised,tokensSold,msg.sender,token.decimals()) (/unique_chucks/13/0xc105c8c7f44128594e49b8300d16b718567863ec.sol#1335-1339)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- tokensSold (/unique_chucks/13/0xc105c8c7f44128594e49b8300d16b718567863ec.sol#1377)
	- weiRaised (/unique_chucks/13/0xc105c8c7f44128594e49b8300d16b718567863ec.sol#1375-1376)

Reentrancy in CrowdsaleExt.investInternal (/unique_chucks/13/0xc105c8c7f44128594e49b8300d16b718567863ec.sol#1310-1405):
	External calls:
	- getState() == State.Funding (/unique_chucks/13/0xc105c8c7f44128594e49b8300d16b718567863ec.sol#1318-1332)
	- tokenAmount = pricingStrategy.calculatePrice(weiAmount,weiRaised - presaleWeiRaised,tokensSold,msg.sender,token.decimals()) (/unique_chucks/13/0xc105c8c7f44128594e49b8300d16b718567863ec.sol#1335-1339)
	- pricingStrategy.isPresalePurchase(receiver) (/unique_chucks/13/0xc105c8c7f44128594e49b8300d16b718567863ec.sol#1377-1380)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- presaleWeiRaised (/unique_chucks/13/0xc105c8c7f44128594e49b8300d16b718567863ec.sol#1378-1380)

Reentrancy in CrowdsaleExt.CrowdsaleExt (/unique_chucks/13/0xc105c8c7f44128594e49b8300d16b718567863ec.sol#1273-1298):
	External calls:
	- setPricingStrategy(_pricingStrategy) (/unique_chucks/13/0xc105c8c7f44128594e49b8300d16b718567863ec.sol#1280-1281)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- endsAt (/unique_chucks/13/0xc105c8c7f44128594e49b8300d16b718567863ec.sol#1287-1288)
	- isUpdatable (/unique_chucks/13/0xc105c8c7f44128594e49b8300d16b718567863ec.sol#1297-1298)
	- isWhiteListed (/unique_chucks/13/0xc105c8c7f44128594e49b8300d16b718567863ec.sol#1298)
	- minimumFundingGoal (/unique_chucks/13/0xc105c8c7f44128594e49b8300d16b718567863ec.sol#1297)
	- multisigWallet (/unique_chucks/13/0xc105c8c7f44128594e49b8300d16b718567863ec.sol#1282)
	- startsAt (/unique_chucks/13/0xc105c8c7f44128594e49b8300d16b718567863ec.sol#1285-1286)

Reentrancy in CrowdsaleExt.investInternal (/unique_chucks/13/0xc105c8c7f44128594e49b8300d16b718567863ec.sol#1310-1405):
	External calls:
	- getState() == State.Funding (/unique_chucks/13/0xc105c8c7f44128594e49b8300d16b718567863ec.sol#1318-1332)
	- tokenAmount = pricingStrategy.calculatePrice(weiAmount,weiRaised - presaleWeiRaised,tokensSold,msg.sender,token.decimals()) (/unique_chucks/13/0xc105c8c7f44128594e49b8300d16b718567863ec.sol#1335-1339)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- investedAmountOf (/unique_chucks/13/0xc105c8c7f44128594e49b8300d16b718567863ec.sol#1368-1373)
	- investorCount (/unique_chucks/13/0xc105c8c7f44128594e49b8300d16b718567863ec.sol#1367-1368)
	- tokenAmountOf (/unique_chucks/13/0xc105c8c7f44128594e49b8300d16b718567863ec.sol#1374)

Reentrancy in CrowdsaleExt.preallocate (/unique_chucks/13/0xc105c8c7f44128594e49b8300d16b718567863ec.sol#1418-1436):
	External calls:
	- tokenAmount = fullTokens * 10 ** token.decimals() (/unique_chucks/13/0xc105c8c7f44128594e49b8300d16b718567863ec.sol#1423-1425)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- investedAmountOf (/unique_chucks/13/0xc105c8c7f44128594e49b8300d16b718567863ec.sol#1427-1432)
	- tokenAmountOf (/unique_chucks/13/0xc105c8c7f44128594e49b8300d16b718567863ec.sol#1432-1435)
	- tokensSold (/unique_chucks/13/0xc105c8c7f44128594e49b8300d16b718567863ec.sol#1427)
	- weiRaised (/unique_chucks/13/0xc105c8c7f44128594e49b8300d16b718567863ec.sol#1426-1427)

CrowdsaleExt.getState (/unique_chucks/13/0xc105c8c7f44128594e49b8300d16b718567863ec.sol#1754-1769) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp <= endsAt && ! isCrowdsaleFull() (/unique_chucks/13/0xc105c8c7f44128594e49b8300d16b718567863ec.sol#1759-1769)
	- block.timestamp < startsAt (/unique_chucks/13/0xc105c8c7f44128594e49b8300d16b718567863ec.sol#1759-1769)

CrowdsaleExt.MAX_INVESTMENTS_BEFORE_MULTISIG_CHANGE should be constant (/unique_chucks/13/0xc105c8c7f44128594e49b8300d16b718567863ec.sol#1144)
FractionalERC20Ext.decimals should be constant (/unique_chucks/13/0xc105c8c7f44128594e49b8300d16b718567863ec.sol#1126)
FractionalERC20Ext.minCap should be constant (/unique_chucks/13/0xc105c8c7f44128594e49b8300d16b718567863ec.sol#1126-1127)
UpgradeAgent.originalSupply should be constant (/unique_chucks/13/0xc105c8c7f44128594e49b8300d16b718567863ec.sol#328-330)
